explains: n. 独来独往的人，喜欢独处的人；不合群的动物

sentences.en: I'm very much a loner – I never go out.
sentences.cn: 我是个非常不合群的人–我从来不出门。

sentences.en: In school I was a loner. I went my own way.
sentences.cn: 在学校里我是个不合群的人，自行其是。

sentences.en: He was a loner by nature and by inclination.
sentences.cn: 他天性不喜交际，且自己也无意于此。
